text: o grantha prajalara! Vastavanga ma pravakta (muham'mad) mi vaddaku vacci vunnadu; miru kappi puccutu unna grantham (baibil) loni enno visayalanu atanu miku bahirgatam cestunnadu; mariyu enno visayalanu upeksistunnadu. Vastavanga mi koraku allah taraphu nundi oka jyoti mariyu oka spastamaina grantham (i khur'an) vacci vunnadi
